ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the DUNS is only 9 digits for Customer type only.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(NOT(AND(ISNUMBER( DUNS_Number__c ), LEN(DUNS_Number__c) = 9)) && NOT(ISBLANK(DUNS_Number__c)) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid DUNS Number of 9 digits.
